snippet.title: Fantasy Realm: A Land Torn Asunder - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
CLASSIC ROLEPLAYING REIMAGINED Embark on an epic open-world adventure, in which you must unite the survivors of a fantastical apocalypse and strike back against the greatest evil the world has ever known.

Find it on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/762240/Fantasy_Realm_A_Land_Torn_Asunder/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/wildwoodgamestudios/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWGameStudios
Website: http://www.wildwoodgamestudios.com

Available for Macintosh and Windows systems March 27th 2018
